title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager wizard, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager should not allow creating a JAR file with unsaved editors.
EB: To address this issue, the JAR packager should provide an option to allow saving unsaved editors before creating the JAR file. Alternatively, the packager can automatically save the unsaved editors before the JAR creation process.
SR: Update the JAR packager to either prompt the user to save unsaved editors before JAR creation or automatically save the unsaved editors before beginning the JAR creation process.
